title: MiniSolrCloudCluster#stopJettySolrRunner differ in implementation
description:
MiniSolrCloudCluster#stopJettySolrRunner(int) : This method stops a jetty and also method removed the jetty from the list
	MiniSolrCloudCluster#stopJettySolrRunner(JettySolrRunner) : This method stops a jetty only



It's confusing to have two implementations of the same method.
